summary: Meditation app UI/UX updates: adjust pre-meditation layout, standardize theme/back buttons, change meditation timer style, and add a post-meditation incremental reflection flow.

existing_features.title: On the Pre-Meditation page, remove the meditation type carousel UI from the setup flow so users are not presented with the carousel-based meditation-type selector.

Re-introduce the step-by-step meditation guide UI in the Pre-Meditation setup flow, and add a clearly placed "More details" control that reveals additional guide content in an appropriate way (e.g., opening an in-page expanded view/dialog/drawer) without re-adding the meditation type carousel.

Standardize the Back button and Light/Dark theme toggle on the following pages by removing any page-specific back/theme controls (including DashboardBackButton and inline Moon/Sun buttons) and replacing them with the same navigation UI used on the Book and Knowledge pages (StandardPageNav): PreMeditationPage (setup/active/reflection views), Journal page ("journey"), and Progress page.

Update the active meditation experience so the meditation timer is circular rather than square by replacing the current square timer UI with the existing circular timer component (MeditationTimerRing) during the active meditation view.

Change the post-meditation reflection flow so prompts are incremental and sequential: (1) prompt the user to select mood/icon state, then (2) prompt the user to select energy state icon, then (3) prompt the user to optionally write a note, optionally mark the session as favorite, and then save. Ensure validation only blocks progression where required (mood and energy required; note optional).

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove meditation carousel type from the pre-meditation page; re-add step guides and an appropriately placed 'More details' button.

On pre-meditation, meditation, journey, and progress pages: remove current light/dark theme and back buttons and replace them with the same theme toggle and back button UI used on book and knowledge pages.
Change meditation page timer from square to circular timer.
After meditation completion, prompt users incrementally: select mood/icon state, then select energy state icon, then optionally write a note, mark favorite, and save.

projectName: Update meditation setup/active/reflection UX and standardize nav controls
